titles.title: A bill for the relief of Frederick Paul and Aileen Paul.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Relieves two named individuals of all Federal tax liability arising from sums awarded to one of them in 1975 pursuant to the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act for legal services rendered on behalf of certain Alaska Natives.
